contexts.context: The Foreign Quarter is the large three-<mark>tiered</mark> canton to the north. Originally, foreigners were not allowed...
...westmost canton. The Hlaalu Councilor Crassius Curio has a splendid <mark>tier</mark>-top mansion here. The tiers below contain Hlaalu treasuries,...
...Crassius Curio has a splendid tier-top mansion here. The <mark>tiers</mark> below contain Hlaalu treasuries, records, holding cells, and...
...a hall of records. Slaves are housed in the lowest <mark>tiers</mark>, along with cells full of monsters. There are many...
...Hall of Records, and Holding Cells. On the lowest <mark>tier</mark> is a Redoran shrine and ancestral vaults. Two noble families...
...families, the Savens and the Dralors, have top-<mark>tier</mark> manors. There are many tradesmen, craftsmen, and trainers...
...Abbey of St. Delyn the Wise is on the top <mark>tier</mark> of St. Delyn, and Hlaalu Councilor Yngling Half-...
...and Hlaalu Councilor Yngling Half-Troll has a top-<mark>tier</mark> manor on St. Olms.
